[#mod-None]
= `None` -- The absent value

The `None` type represents a type with _no_ value, often used to mark dead
code.

For example, the type `[None]` has only empty lists.


[#None_absurd]
== `absurd`
Turns an absurd value into an arbitrary type.



[listing]
absurd : <A> None -> A
